56ee6c3c-923f-450b-9165-cecb17d5f7bc.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

42107c25-214c-4411-b6ca-0cc3fc6c7509.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture
